### melt

▸ **melt**<`Builder`, `Element`, `Attributes`, `A`, `Param`\>(`node`, `params`):
`ActionReturn`<`Builder`, `Attributes`\>

A special action for Melt UI's preprocessor `@melt-ui/pp`.

#### Type parameters

| Name         | Type                                            |
| :----------- | :---------------------------------------------- |
| `Builder`    | extends `SomeBuilder`<`Element`, `Param`, `A`\> |

| Name     | Type      |
| :------- | :-------- |
| `node`   | `Element` |
| `params` | `Builder` |

`ActionReturn`<`Builder`, `Attributes`\>

**`See`**

https://www.melt-ui.com/docs/preprocessor

**`Example`**

```svelte
<script>
	import { createLabel, melt } from '@melt-ui/svelte'
	const {
		elements: { root }
	} = createLabel()
</script>

<label use:melt={$root} />
```
